title: The foreach Loop
text: There is also a "for-each loop" (introduced in C++ version 11 (2011)), which is used exclusively to loop through elements in an array (and other data structures, like vectors and lists):
The following examples output all elements in an array using a "for-each loop":

examples.heading: Syntax
examples.code:
for (type variableName : arrayName) {  // code block to be executed
  }
